entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
